articles.description: Warner Bros. has once again delayed the release of the Christopher Nolan-directed film, “Tenet," amid reported cases of the novel coronavirus surging.
articles.content:

articles.author: Frank Pallotta, CNN Business
articles.title: Disney announces major change to Splash Mountain ride after outcry - CNN
articles.description: Splash Mountain — one of Disney's most popular but problematic rides — will be "completely reimagined," the company announced on Thursday.
